document.full_text: a federal judge on friday ruled that the u.s. army corps of engineers can blow up a mississippi river levee, which would flood missouri farmland but prevent the flooding of an illinois town.
document.title: judge says southern illinois levee can be blown up
lines_and_colors: a federal judge on friday ruled that the u.s. army corps of engineers can blow up a mississippi river levee, which would flood missouri farmland but prevent the flooding of an illinois town.
